entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries or rain showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:57 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
